definition: to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Don't indulge in momentary pleasure but beg a pleasant journey.
sentences.chinese: 不逞一時之快，只求一路平安。

sentences.english: Comrade, I wish you bon voyage, be careful in the midnight cold north wind.
sentences.chinese: 戰友，祝你一路平安，當心夜半北風寒。

sentences.english: I wish they May you be safe throughout the journey in the coming days.
sentences.chinese: 我祝福他們在未來的日子裏一路平安。

sentences.english: OK. Wish you a safe journey!
She wished them a safe journey.
OK, have a safe trip home.
Our parents wished us a safe journey.
sentences.chinese: 父母希望我們一路平安。

sentences.english: And to the bonny Bonn banks forever I 'll bid adieu.
sentences.chinese: 我會永遠一路平安地到達美麗的波恩湖畔。

sentences.english: We wish you both a safe and pleasant journey home.
sentences.chinese: 我們祝二位回家旅途愉快，一路平安。

sentences.english: I also had to have no alternative wish it in the moral nature to be bon voyage.
sentences.chinese: 我也只好無可奈何地在心底祝它一路平安了。

definition: lit. peace when you come or go/peace wherever you go
safe and sound/well/without mishap/quiet and safe/at peace
to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
precious/extremely valuable/(honorific) Please take good care of yourself!
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
I'm sure we'll meet again some day. (idiom)/Hope to see you again.
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
with one's heart set on speeding home (idiom)
